description.raw:
* [drone.io](https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/475) is happy.
* [Jenkins Trusty](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-trusty-amd64/34/) is happy.
* [Jenkins Utopic](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-utopic-amd64/8/) is happy.
* [Jenkins HomeBrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/60/) is happy.
* [Jenkins Windows](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-windows7-amd64/42/console) is happy (the code compiles, we still cannot run tests on Windows).
description.html:
• drone.io is happy.
  • Jenkins Trusty is happy.
  • Jenkins Utopic is happy.
  • Jenkins HomeBrew is happy.
  • Jenkins Windows is happy (the code compiles, we still cannot run tests on Windows).

title.raw: Fix small memory leak reported by valgrind
